newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-RAYO SACK COACH ZAMBRANO AND FINE STRIKER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-RAYO SACK COACH ZAMBRANO AND FINE STRIKER.

text.p: Rayo Vallecano sacked coach Fernando Zambrano and replaced him with his deputy Maximo Hernandez on Tuesday after the team slumped to six straight defeats in the Spanish first divison.
Rayo, currently in 17th place, also fined striker Guilherme two million pesetas ($14,000) for insulting the crowd during their 4-0 home defeat to Real Betis on Sunday.
"They were cheering Betis," commented the Brazilian.
